long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Less CPU 4 U is a chrome extension that discards tabs after they are unused for a certain period of time. This saves CPU and memory usage and creates a smoother Chrome experience. 

Features include a central window to manage discarded and ignored tabs, including functionality to quickly restore or remove a discarded tab and easily ignore the current active tab.
